ne22:1.1_0: This is the meaning of earring?
ne22:2.3_0: and right view at the fore.
ne22:2.5_0: a mendicant who has overcome dullness and drowsiness
ne22:3.1_0: “Because of your mind, thought, speech, mind, and thought of right thought. It’s hard for one who understands right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion. In this way they’ll reach a bad rebirth, old age, and death, and death, of sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress.
ne22:3.2_0: From the stilling of all rebirths, there will be in a bad place, the underworld, bound for rebirth.
ne22:3.3_0: always yoked by committed to the loment.
